name: Curse of the Wereburger
description:
You've been bitten by the dreadful Wereburger, and now your fate is sealed.

Each step devours precious time... With every second your monsterous metamorphosis crawls closer. Worse yet, this cemetery is a puzzling labyrinth of gravestones and gates with few exits in sight. You'd best get a move on - I reckon you don't have much time left...

Move with the [arrow keys]. Restart stages with [R]. Every movement ticks the seconds by. It's true that this curse can both help and harm, so heed your environment. One horrible thing's for sure: You'd best escape this cemetery before the full moon arrives.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme "every 10 seconds."

Code by Josh Edwards (@joshedev), art & animation by crelish (@crelishboy), and music by Valerie (@Valbun1).
